title: Print Data Model
description:
Describes the information for a print of a card.
This model contains the properties of the printed card that will not be common to all of them

id.title: UUID (v5) of the Print generated by YGOJSON

cardId.title: UUID (v5) of the Card generated by YGOJSON
cardId.description: UUID (v5) of the Card that is associated to this Print

setId.title: UUID (v5) of the Set generated by YGOJSON
setId.description: UUID (v5) of the Set that is associated to this Print

printCode.title: Code identifying the specific Print of a Card
printCode.description:
The code identifying the Print is composed by the setCode, the regionCode and the setNumber
Note that this is not present in Series 1 prints

setCode.title: Code, abbreviation or name of the Set this print belongs to
setCode.description:
Set code or abbreviation of the set
Note that for cards without printCode, this is the name of the set (i.e., for Series 1)

printNumberSuffix.title: Suffix for the printNumber
printNumberSuffix.description: For some sets, the printNumber might have a suffix (i.e., K-Series)

printNumber.title: Print number, usually the order on the set

printNumberPrefix.title: Prefix for the printNumber
printNumberPrefix.description:
Some sets include a prefix on the printNumber to indicate a sub-set.
Also, special editions and/or promotional cards have a prefix to indicate that they are not from the original set
